description: GET request to the "/geocode" endpoint with an "address" parameter containing the address or place you want to geocode
name: geolocate_get_coordinates

description: Super Fast Geocode API: Instantly convert any address into precise latitude and longitude using our lightning‑fast, free, and unlimited geocoding service. No API key required—just provide the "address" parameter and receive accurate coordinates in JSON. Ideal for developers needing quick, reliable location data worldwide.
name: super_fast_geocode
